title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection â€“ Optical character recognition (OCR) support for SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business
description: ,With this update, you will be able to detect and protect sensitive content in images in SharePoint Online and OneDrive and subsequently apply DLP policies to prevent exfiltration of that sensitive data. This release supports key file types like JPG, JPEG, PNG, BMP (image only). Note: PDF and TIFF will be forthcoming, and a new roadmap will be created when appropriate. We apologize for any inconvenience.
